title: GESIS Search — gesis_search
text: query search term query. Terms can seperated operators / . operator specified, defaults operator specified default_operator. NULL, searches records. Queryless searches can still filtered using parameters . type Type search results retrieve. Can one "research_data", "variables", "instruments_tools", "publication", "gesis_bib", "gesis_web" "gesis_person". NULL, includes result types. Defaults NULL. default_operator Character specifying default operator use seperator search terms. Can "" "". Defaults "". Ignored query NULL. fields Character vector field weights returned field_weights. Used specify much weight given query matches certain metadata fields. higher weight, field influences match probability. Defaults default values specified field_weights. Ignored query NULL. sort Attribute sort . Must one "relevance", "newest_first", "oldest_first", "title_ascending", "title_descending", "variable_ascending", "variable_descending". Defaults "relevance". publication_year Numeric character vector length 2 specifying time range record published. first value start year second value end year. NULL, returns records years. Defaults NULL. countries Character vector specifying country record published. NULL, returns records countries. Defaults NULL. topics Character vector specifying topics filter . Example values include "Political behavior attitudes" "Migration". See https://search.gesis.org/ full list possible topics. authors Character vector specifying authors filter . sources Character vector specifying source record. study_title Character vector specifying study title. sensible research data variables. study_group Character vector specifying study group. sensible research data variables. collection_year Numeric character vector length 2 specifying time range dataset collected. first value start year second value end year. NULL, returns records years. Defaults NULL. sensible research data variables. thematic_collections Character vector specifying thematic collection dataset variable belongs . Example values include "COVID-19" "Environment climate". See https://search.gesis.org/ full list possible topics. method_data_collection, method_sampling, method_time, method_unit Arguments filter methodology used study. possible filter mode data collection (method_data_collection), sampling procedure (method_sampling), temporal research design (method_unit) analysis unit (method_unit). sensible research data variables. data_type Character vector specifying data type dataset variable. Example values include "numeric", "geospatial", "text". sensible research data variables. interview_language Character vector specifying interview language variable. Usually "german" "english" available. sensible variables. pages Numeric vector specifying page numbers search results. default, first page returned. NULL, iterates pages. tidy TRUE, returns records rectangular shape can wrangled easily. form, complex metadata fields converted rectangular shapre discarded. FALSE, returns records list-like gesis_records object. object comprehensive, harder work . Defaults FALSE. x Object class gesis_records ... Arguments passed respective S3 methods.
